song_name: Just Give Me a Reason (feat. Nate Ruess)
lyrics:
91 contributorstranslationsελληνικάjust give me a reason lyricsverse 1 pnk
right from the start
you were a thief you stole my heart
and i your willing victim
i let you see the parts of me
that werent all that pretty

now youve been talking in your sleep

oh oh tell me that youve had enough
of our love our love

just give me a reason
just a little bits enough
just a second were not broken just bent
and we can learn to love again
its in the stars
its been written in the scars on our hearts
were not broken just bent
and we can learn to love again

im sorry i dont understand
where all of this is coming from
i thought that we were fine
oh we had everything

and its all in your mind
yeah but this is happening

oh our love our love love
